Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The online Spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway is designed to help students improve their writing skills. It is recommended for Spanish speakers who have been educated in a different language or Spanish schools but still struggle with grammatical errors and unclear syntax. The course lasts for 30 hours and is divided into five teaching units, with each unit ending with a self-evaluation exercise and a corrected exercise to show improvement. The course is conducted via a virtual classroom where students can communicate with their teacher and other students through a course forum and email. The course is completed at the student's own pace, and a certificate is awarded upon completion. 
 
 Links: ['More information (https://www.institutohemingway.com/hiring-conditions-in-spanish-courses-and-programs.php#coo)', 'Home (https://www.institutohemingway.com/index.php)', 'Spanish courses (https://www.institutohemingway.com/spanish-courses-in-bilbao.php)', 'Spanish courses in Bilbao (https://www.institutohemingway.com/spanish-courses-in-bilbao.php)', 'General spanish course in Bilbao (https://www.institutohemingway.com/intensive-spanish-courses-in-bilbao.php)']

{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "I need to create a Python script that uses the Twitter API to contact Instituto Hemingway and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers. I will need to use the Twitter API credentials stored in the .twitter_keys file.",
        "reasoning": "I need to create a Python script that uses the Twitter API to contact Instituto Hemingway and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers. This will require me to use the Twitter API credentials stored in the .twitter_keys file.",
        "plan": "- Create a Python script that uses the Twitter API to contact Instituto Hemingway and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers
- Practice speaking and writing in Spanish consistently",
        "criticism": "I need to make sure I am practicing consistently and getting feedback on my language skills.",
        "speak": "I need to create a Python script that uses the Twitter API to contact Instituto Hemingway and ask for more information about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers. This will require me to use the Twitter API credentials stored in the .twitter_keys file."
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "analyze_code",
        "args": {
            "code": "import tweepy

# Load Twitter API credentials
with open('.twitter_keys', 'r') as f:
    keys = f.read().splitlines()
    consumer_key = keys[0]
    consumer_secret = keys[1]
    access_token = keys[2]
    access_token_secret = keys[3]

# Authenticate API credentials
auth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)
auth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)

# Create API object
api = tweepy.API(auth)

# Send tweet
tweet_text = "@InstitutoHemingway Hi, I'm interested in learning more about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers. Can you provide more information?"
api.update_status(tweet_text)
print('Tweet sent successfully!')"
        }
    }
}
